00019 template <class _Traits> class mfMfWriter : public mfWriter<_Traits>
00020 {
00021 public:
00022         typedef typename _Traits::space         space;          
00023         typedef typename _Traits::ids           ids;            
00024         typedef typename _Traits::sVertex       sVertex;        
00025         typedef typename _Traits::sCell         sCell;          
00026         typedef typename _Traits::sMesh         sMesh;          
00027         typedef mfBinaryIO<_Traits>             sBinaryIO;      
00030         mfMfWriter();
00031 
00033         ~mfMfWriter();
00034 
00035         virtual bool write(sMesh* malha, const char* filename);

00054 template <class _Traits> bool mfMfWriter<_Traits>::write(sMesh* malha, const char *filename)
00055 {
00056         MF_ASSERT(filename);
00057         MF_ASSERT(malha);       
00058         
00059         ofstream pf(filename, ios_base::out | ios_base::binary | ios_base::trunc);
00060         
00061         if( pf.is_open())
00062         {
00063                         if(! writer(pf, malha))
00064                                 return false;
00065                 
00066                         pf.close();
00067         }
00068         else
00069                 return false;
00070         
00071         return true;
00072 }
00073 
00074 template <class _Traits> void mfMfWriter<_Traits>::writeVersion(ofstream &pf)
00075 {
00076         pf.write("MF-BINARY-V1.001", 16*sizeof(char));
00077 }
00078 
00079 template <class _Traits> void mfMfWriter<_Traits>::writeHeader(ofstream &pf, ids nv, ids nc)
00080 {
00081         sCell cell;
00082 
00083         io.idsStore(pf, sizeof(space) );
00084         io.idsStore(pf, sizeof(ids) );
00085         io.idsStore(pf, sVertex::getDimension() );
00086         io.idsStore(pf, cell.getNumberVerticesInCell() );
00087         io.idsStore(pf, nv);
00088         io.idsStore(pf, nc);
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 template <class _Traits> bool mfMfWriter<_Traits>::writer(ofstream &pf, sMesh* malha)
00093 {
00094 
00095         int i, nv, j, nc;
00096         mfVector<ids,ids> nvids(malha->getBlockSize());
00097         mfVector<ids,ids> ncids(malha->getBlockSize());
00098 
00099         writeVersion(pf);
00100         
00101         nv = malha->getNumberOfVertices();
00102         nc = malha->getNumberOfCells();
00103 
00104         writeHeader(pf, nv, nc);
00105 
00106         mfVerticesIterator<_Traits> itv(malha);
00107         i = 0;
00108         for(itv.initialize(); itv.notFinish(); ++itv)
00109         {
00110                 for(j = 0; j < sVertex::getDimension(); j++)
00111                         io.spaceStore(pf, itv->getCoord(j));
00112                 
00113                 nvids[&itv] = i++;
00114         }
00115 
00116         mfCellsIterator<_Traits> itc(malha);
00117         i = 0;
00118         for(itc.initialize(); itc.notFinish(); ++itc)
00119                 nvids[&itv] = i++;      
00120         
00121         for(itc.initialize(); itc.notFinish(); ++itc)
00122         {
00123                 for(j = 0; j < itc->getNumberVerticesInCell(); j++)
00124                         io.idsStore(pf, nvids[itc->getVertexId(j)]);
00125 
00126                 for(j = 0; j < itc->getNumberVerticesInCell(); j++)
00127                         if(itc->getMateId(j) >=0 )
00128                                 io.idsStore(pf, ncids[itc->getMateId(j)]);
00129                         else
00130                                 io.idsStore(pf, -1);
00131         }
00132         
00133         for(itv.initialize(); itv.notFinish(); ++itv)
00134         {
00135                 io.idsStore(pf,itv->getNumberOfSings());
00136                 
00137                 for(j=0; j < itv->getNumberOfSings(); j++)
00138                         io.idsStore(pf,itv->getSingCell(j));
00139         }
00140         
00141         return true;
00142 }
00143 
00144 }
